block.name: query_list
block.comment: Remove duplicate opp number and prepare data for sql IN()

input.sql:
select distinct
orders.OracleOrderNumber,
orders.PoNumber,
orders.PB,
orders.COO,
orders.RTM,

opp.CloseDate,
opp.AccountId,
opp.CurrencyIsoCode,
opp.Id,
opp.OpportunityNumber__c

from #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"378f4987","path":["list_name"]}')} as orders 
LEFT JOIN  #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"3e99b7bc","path":["list_name"]}')} as opp on 
orders.Oppnumber = opp.OpportunityNumber__c

extended_input_schema.hint: Select the schema template of the file that is to be retrieved in batches. If you have a sample CSV file in the directory, choose “Provide with sample file” option. If not, select “Provide manually” to define the schema.

properties.label: Roll back records when errors occur?
properties.hint: When Yes, the batch is rolled back when the creation of an object fails. If the batch is larger than 200 records, only the affected batch is rolled back. The default, No, is recommended.
